DOC.brief_summary: There are no special clinical characteristics of acute pulmonary embolism in Chinese population.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Characteristics of Acute Pulmonary Embolism in Chinese Population
DOC.criteria: the symptomatic acute PE confirmed by objective examination congestive heart failure chronic obstructive pulmonary disease; a prior documented episode of PE or DVT renal dysfunction; a life expectancy of less than 6 months
